properties.title: S3 snow and ice products
properties.description: Automated open source processing chain using Sentinel-3 OLCI and SLSTR sensors to determine a dry/wet snow and clean/polluted bare ice spectral and broadband optical albedo 1 km daily product for land ice (glaciers, ice caps, ice sheet)
properties.osc:name: Pre-Operational Sentinel-3 snow and ice products (SICE)
osc:consortium: GEOLOGICAL SURVEY OF DENMARK AND GREENLAND (DK)
